title: Processes - Integration by Completing the Square

content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator 8, and denominator the square root of 12 minus, x squared, minus 4 x, end root, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>12</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="16 times, the square root of 12 minus, x squared, minus 4 x, end root, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>16</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>12</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the inverse sine of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator x plus 2, and denominator 4, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="8 times the inverse sine of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator x minus 2, and denominator 4, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="8 times the inverse sine of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator x plus 2, and denominator 4, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="8 times the inverse sine of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator x plus 2, and denominator 4, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
